text: When working locally is there anyway to use variables in the `module.css`? I want to keep my module css just when the module is used so I like keeping it inside the module. But is there no ways to use SCSS for them?
Hey Iâ€™ve been working through similar testing and can confirm scss is not something processed anywhere in the design manager, module css, etc.
custom properties may work though if you are just looking for variable type usage.
